::GoldenEye::

She put her hands on her hips and looked at him.  Her slender figure, 
standing tall and unmoving. She looked at him with her peircing gold 
eyes."I'm GoldenEye.  Pleased to met you. And I wouldn't worry about 
your symbol.  It will get blown of in time.  It's the symbol the 
Maximals aim for.  Knowing that it will hurt the most if it is 
marred."  She took her hand and wiped her symbol a little. She looked 
at him and smiled.  He was good looking, darn right handsome. She 
couldn't hep but smile at him. "So, what brings you to our little 
rock?" she said with a smile.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dollen::
> 
>            The stasis pod DNA scanners scanned the area for a 
suitable
> lifeform to give Dollen a beast mode.  After a suitable lifeform 
was found,
> the bot inside, named Dollen, heard banging on the stasis pod, and 
someone
> talking to him.  The stasis pod opened up, and Dollen stepped out.
> 
>             Dollen looked at GoldenEye.  He suddenly thought about 
dreams
> and visions he had been having about a female bot.  The female bot 
he kept
> having visions about was beautiful.  But, he did not know her name, 
or
> anything.  He looked at GoldenEye again.  No.  This bot wasn't the 
one.  He
> looked at her symbol.  Then he looked at his.  She wasn't an 
enemy.  She was
> on his side, or so it appeared.  He had to make sure.  He looked at 
his
> signature detector.  Yes, she was a Predacon, on his side.
> 
>                   "Ah, nice to meet you.  My name is Dollen.  I see 
your a
> Predacon, like me," Dollen stopped, and grabbed a little thing from 
his arm
> storage compartment.  Inside it was creamy stuff, and then Dollen 
put some
> on his finger, and rubbed it on his Pred symbol, which was located 
on his
> chest.  He grabbed a cloth out of his arm as well, which was odd, 
as you
> don't see too many bots with a cloth.  He rubbed his symbol with 
the cloth,
> and then his symbol was shiny and clean.  He put the stuff back in 
his
> compartment.
> 
>            "Sorry about that little pause, I had to polish my 
symbol, to
> show that I respect my title as a Predacon.  Anyway, what is your 
name?"
